title: Hanes Men's Hanes Men's Socks, X-temp Cushioned Crew Socks, 12-pack
description: COMFORT YOU DESERVE – Cushioned bottom makes these cushioned socks for men a sure bet for everyday wear, from work, play, gym, sports, and beyond.
KEEPING YOU COMFORTABLE - Hanes' X-Temp technology adapts to your temperature for all day comfort.
KEEP YOUR COOL - Cool Comfort fabric wicks away moisture so your feet stay cool and dry all day.
FRESH ALL DAY - Fresh IQ advanced odor protection technology fights the bacteria that causes odor on workout days or any days to help fight stinky feet

Designed for the guy with an active lifestyle, these cushioned crew socks from Hanes® are packed with performance features that treat your feet with comfort. These classic crew socks are made with X-Temp™ technology and Cool Comfort® fabric, teaming up to wick away moisture to keep feet cool and dry no matter how rigorous your workout or how stressful your day. Plus these high-performance crew socks have FreshIQ™ advanced odor-fighting technology that keeps feet smelling fresh. These quality crew socks have a reinforced toe and heel for enhanced wear and built-in arch compression with spandex for a supportive, stretchy fit. You'll appreciate the extra cushioning along the bottom for added impact comfort and the airy ventilated panels that help your feet breathe. Smooth toe seams provide even more comfort. Stock up on these cooling crew socks in a convenient 12-pack, ready to perform for work or play.
